description:
Habitat – Louez, achetez et explorez des propriétés en Mauritanie

Découvrez facilement des appartements, maisons et terrains à vendre ou à louer. Que vous soyez à la recherche d’un séjour de vacances, d’une location longue durée ou de votre future maison, Habitat vous accompagne à chaque étape :

Parcourez des propriétés avec photos et vidéos immersives

Explorez des terrains à vendre et des opportunités d’investissement

Louez rapidement et en toute sécurité, ou achetez votre futur logement

Recevez des notifications et gardez vos favoris sous la main

Habitat, la solution simple, rapide et fiable pour tous vos besoins immobiliers.

Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to support your daily spiritual journey. With essential features like accurate prayer time reminders, Azkar collection, and Qibla direction, it helps strengthen your faith and manage your daily worship seamlessly.

Key Features:

* Accurate Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again! Get precise notifications for all Salah times (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on your location.
* Azkar & Duas: Immerse yourself in spiritual invocations with a curated collection of Azkar and Duas, perfect for morning, evening, and every moment in between. Strengthen your connection with Allah through heartfelt invocations.
* Tasbih Counter: Elevate your Dhikr practice with the built-in Tasbih Counter. This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer bead counter to help you track your count while reciting your prayer or Dua.
* Qibla Direction: Find the Qibla direction accurately, no matter where you are. The integrated Qibla compass ensures precise alignment for your prayers.
* Quran Access: Read and reflect on the Holy Quran directly within the app. The clear and user-friendly interface allows for easy navigation between chapters and verses, supporting your daily recitation goals.
* Prayer Reminders: Never miss a prayer with customizable reminders that fit your routine. Whether it's a gentle nudge for Fajr or a midday reminder for Dhuhr, you'll stay connected to your worship schedule.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is designed to be your trusted spiritual companion, integrating faith seamlessly into your daily routine. Whether you're managing prayer times, reflecting on Quranic verses, or seeking solace in Azkar and Duas, this app supports your spiritual growth and devotion.

Download now and experience the convenience, guidance, and fulfillment of having a complete Islamic companion right at your fingertips. Stay connected to your faith, no matter where life takes you.

Your Identity,Masterpiece by AI!
Your face,your rules—Uniquely you.

IconicYou:Where Your Personality Becomes Art!
Whether you're a trendsetter,a meme lover,or a low-key professional,we've got your vibe covered.Create your own unique avatar with just a few taps!

AI-Powered Avatar Magic
• Text-to-Art:Describe it,we create it!From"cyberpunk cat astronaut"to"vintage oil painting self,"watch your words transform into stunning visuals.
• Photo Remix:Upload a pic(with your permission!)and let AI reimagine you as anything—anime hero,Renaissance royalty,or even your pet's stylish twin!

Free to Start
• Daily Headshot Downloads:Get 3 free headshots every day.
• Magic Wands:Earn 2 magic wands just for logging in daily.

Unlock More with Subscription
• Weekly Plan:Fast generation,watermark removal,unlimited headshot downloads,and more!
• Monthly Plan:Enhanced features,more magic wands,and an ad-free experience.

Privacy&Security
• Zero data tracking:We don't want your info,just your creativity.
• End-to-end encryption:Your photos vanish after processing,ensuring your privacy.

Let your avatar speak volumes!Download Uniquely You and start creating your masterpiece today.

Hisn Almuslim Azkar & Doaa
يضم برنامج حصن المسلم العديد من الأذكار والأدعية الواردة في كتاب حصن المسلم والتي لا غني عنها في حياتنا اليومية وفي معاملاتنا مع الناس وذلك بطريقة سهلة وبسيطة.
تم إضافة ميزات عديدة للبرنامج حتي تتمكن من الوصول إلي الأذكار بسهولة ويسر ومن بعض هذه المزايا:
- فهرسة الأذكار لسهولة تصفحها
- جميع الأذكار مضبوطة بالتشكيل
- يحتوي كل ذكر علي سند الحديث الخاص به أو السورة القرآنية وفضل الذكر
- أمكانية إضافة الأذكار التي تقرئها بكثرة إلي قائمة الأذكار المفضلة لسهولة الوصول إليها بعد ذلك
- إمكانية البحث في والفهرس الأذكار سويا
- إمكانية تكبير وتصغير الخط
- خاصية التذكير بأذكار الصبح والمساء
- إمكانية عمل التطبيق علي الجوالات التي لا تدعم العربية
- تعديل الخط وحل مشكلة الحروف المتقطعة في بعض الجوالات
ويحتوي البرنامج علي الأذكار التالية:

أهلاً وسهلاً بك في تطبيق اذكار المسلم الجديد! بعد اليوم.. لن تنسى أبدا ذكر الله!
الآن وبعد طول انتظار تقدّم لكم "كنوز" برنامجها الجديد "اذكار المسلم" والذي من خلاله ستقضون تجربة ايمانية رائعة لا مثيل لها!، عبر إظهار الاذكار والأدعية المأثورة على شاشة الهاتف وبشكل مميز للغاية!
التطبيق مميز للغاية و تمّت برمجته ليعمل بذكاء.. كي لا تنسى أبداً ذكر الله!

انضم الى حملتنا العالمية لنشر التطبيق ليصل إلى 100 مليون مسلم حول العالم!
عبر المشاركة إلى اللأصدقاء في واتس اب و تويتر .. لنجعل كافة اجهزة الآيفون حول العالم تصدح بذكر الله!

الخصائص والميزات

* التحكم بوتيرة ظهور الأذكار على الشاشة يومياً
* عدة أصناف للأذكار من داخل التطبيق: اذكار الصباح، المساء، الاستيقاظ، المسجد، النوم.. وغيرها.. بالاضافة الى تسبيحات، واستغفارات وادعية مأثورة لتظهر على الشاشة كتنبيهات صامتة
* امكانية إضافة أدعية واذكار خاصة بك

There are several varieties of Adhkar included, such as Morning and Evening, Well-known islamic prayers, and much more!

Glovo is the #1 app for ordering anything you want! With more than 240,000 restaurants & stores available, and delivery in minutes. Download the app now & order a Glovo!

Easily order food, groceries and gifts in your city without leaving home.

Want to order food straight to your door? Or get a grocery delivery of your essentials? We save you time, when you don’t have it. 

WHY USE GLOVO?

▶ Over 80 million downloads worldwide.
▶ Order in 23 countries including Spain, Portugal, Romania, Morocco, Italy, Poland, Croatia, Ukraine, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Nigeria, Bulgaria, Serbia, Armenia, Bosnia-herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova & Andorra.
▶ More than 240,000 restaurants, supermarkets and stores available globally.
▶ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, Telepizza, Starbucks, Domino’s Pizza, Carrefour, PENNY., Eataly, Flying Tiger, Kiko Milano, Lafarmacia, Auchan, Decathlon, MediaMarkt and many more.
▶ Your favourite food delivery in minutes: Order burgers, pizza, chicken, kebab, pasta, sandwiches, sushi, poké…anything you want.
▶ Pay however you like. We accept PayPal, card payment, cash and even restaurant vouchers.
▶ Track your delivery or takeaway in real time and chat with our support team if need be.
▶ Subscribe to Glovo Prime and get unlimited free deliveries of food, groceries, and shopping. Save on every delivery! Available in selected countries.
▶ Invite your friends and earn money for each one who places an order on the app.

YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, IN MINUTES!

Fancy a tasty dinner? Has it been a long day? You deserve to have your food delivered to your door! Or are you on your way somewhere? You can order food to take away and grab it on the go.

With Glovo, you can order up to 65 different types of food in your city. Including a burger from the most famous restaurants, to ordering from your favourite sushi place. There are more than 216,000 restaurants available worldwide for delivery or takeaway of your favourite food, in a matter of minutes.


GROCERY DELIVERY WITHOUT LEAVING HOME

Forget something from the supermarket? Got friends over and want to order another round of drinks or snacks? 

Now you can also order your groceries from the supermarket. Choose whatever you want from your favourite supermarket or local store and Glovo will deliver it to you in a few minutes. Food, snacks, drinks, something sweet, a missing ingredient... any groceries you need! 


THE APP TO ORDER ANYTHING

Glovo delivers everything. Find more than 27000 stores on the app, with all kinds of products. All your shopping on one app: surprise gifts, a last-minute purchase or whatever you need.

And if you need to send or pick up something in your city, Glovo can run errands for you. Choose a pick-up and delivery point and a courier will take care of the rest, with delivery in minutes!


NEED HELP? CONTACT US

If you’re looking for help with an order or have any questions about Glovo, please contact our support team via the support section in our app or on our website.

You can also find us on:
▶ Our site: https://glovoapp.com/ 
▶ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/glovoappES 
▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/glovo_es/ 
▶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Glovo_ES

Download Glovo now! Order food, groceries, shopping or courier service - with delivery in minutes.

You can save your tesbihat with smart dhikr application which is designed as real tasbeeh counter that looks like a ring. You can use the mobile dhikr application for the names of ALLAH (c.c), Salat-ı Tefriciye and for Salaah Tesbihat. Tasbeeh application will record your all dhikrs.

Even you close Digital Tasbeeh Counter, the number of the dhikr will not erased. When you restart the aplication, the dhikr number will appear on the screen. You should press the button to pulse the number.

You can save your dhikrs as the number of dhikrs, date and the name of the dhikrs to press the save button. You don 't have to check the screen, because digital tasbeeh counter app will give you vibration warning. Digital Tasbeeh Counter has three buttons basically: counter button, saving button and pulse button.

You can adjust the vibration or colours from the buttons top on the screen. In addition to save the battary, you can use the application on night mode. Digital Tasbeeh Counter is free and you won't see any advertisement during dhikr.

Specifications

Even you close the aplication, you never loose the numbers of the dhikrs untill you press the pulse button.

You can save your all dhikrs with the names and dates.

You can customize Digital Tasbeeh Counter with themes.

The application will save the energy by the help of night mode option.

You can dhikr with out check the screen by the help of vibration (you can close the vibration).

You can check your ex dhikrs by name, date and numbers.

TwetLink, it is an platform to receive messages and opinions of friends anonymously to get to know the way people see you and what they think about you.

- TwetLink application features :

Receive anonymous messages in secret and security.

Learn about your advantages, disadvantages and what people think of you.

Publicly reply to incoming messages.

Show incoming messages to the general public for all to see.

Enhance your personality by knowing reality away from hypocrisy.


- how to use the TwetLink app :

1 - Download the application to your phone

2 - Log in with one of the available methods

3 - You will then receive a unique link to your account

4 - Share your link on the networks and between your friends

5 - You will then receive anonymous messages from friends and you will receive notification when new messages arrive.

6 - You can share and respond to Instagram, Snapchat, or Facebook status.

If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact us via the following e-mail:

support@twet.link

Terms of Use : https://twet.link/terms

AlMosaly is the largest Islamic app, your companion in your day, with + 40 M Muslims worldwide, with new services and surprises. 
enjoy Azan and prayer times with complete accuracy according to your country and city, in addition to many features, such as (complete supplications, the Qur’an with the Khatmah, supplications, supplications, Qiblah, rosary, legal ruqyah, accounting verses, your obediences, and more) with everything you need in your daily and devotional life, it is the best companion for you in your life.

BENEFITS OF AlMosaly FOR MUSLIMS:

- Salah Times: The app provides location-based Islamic prayer times and pre-Azan notifications, enabling users to pray with precision and timeliness.
- Azan: The app features azan pray times, providing audible reminders for prayer times.
- Nearby Mosques: The app locates mosques in the vicinity, saving users the effort of searching for them during prayer times. 
- Qibla Finder: In 5 accurate ways, it features an electronic compass that accurately indicates the qibla direction with a clear illustration.
- The Holy Quran: Users have access to the Holy Quran, complete with translations in various recitations.
- Azkar: The app includes morning and evening remembrances (Morning Athkar and Evening Athkar), along with personalized Azkar notifications throughout the day.
- Dua: It offers Muslim supplications from the Quran and the Quran and Prophet's Sunnah
- Tasbih: Users can utilize an electronic Tasbih during waiting times or at other suitable moments.
- The Hijri Calendar: This feature includes important Islamic dates, such as Ramadan 2025.
- Multi-Language Support: AlMosaly provides content in more than one language to cater to Muslims around the globe.

With a simple, user-friendly interface and customization options, the app allows modifications in the calculation of prayer times based on different sects
Designed for Muslims worldwide, AlMosaly app serves as an essential companion in their daily lives, enhancing their faith through intelligent reminders and reliable resources. It is an indispensable application for Muslim smartphones.




“Download the AlMosaly app now and maintain a lifelong connection to your Islamic practices.”




Join us on social media:

Instagram: www.instagram.com/mosalyapp
Twitter: twitter.com/almosallyapp

Muslim Plus is a comprehensive Islamic app designed to serve millions of Muslims worldwide, especially focused on the Gulf region. It combines essential daily Islamic services and spiritual tools in one easy-to-use platform.

Enjoy accurate prayer times with location-based adjustments and clear Azan notifications to help you pray on time wherever you are.

Access the complete Holy Quran with over 50 renowned reciters, available offline after initial download — no internet needed for uninterrupted listening.

Find nearby mosques quickly and use the precise Qibla compass to ensure you’re always facing the right direction during prayer.

Benefit from a rich collection of authentic Azkar (morning and evening remembrances), Dua from the Quran and Sunnah, and a handy digital Tasbih counter to support your daily worship.

Keep track of important dates with the Hijri calendar, including Ramadan and other Islamic events, and customize prayer time calculations based on your preferred method.

Features at a glance:

Prayer Times & Azan: Accurate, location-based timings with pre-Azan alerts.

Offline Quran: Stream or download all Quranic chapters with multiple reciters.

Nearby Mosques: Easily locate mosques close to your current location.

Qibla Finder: Electronic compass with clear directional guidance.

Azkar & Dua: Daily remembrances and supplications with notifications.

Digital Tasbih: Track your dhikr anytime, anywhere.

Hijri Calendar: Stay updated with Islamic dates and events.

Multi-language Support: Designed to support users worldwide with ease of use.

With a clean, user-friendly interface, Muslim Plus is your trusted companion for a more connected and spiritually fulfilling daily life.

Download Muslim Plus now and strengthen your connection to your faith every day.

حصن المسلم: أذكار وأدعية

يضم برنامج حصن المسلم العديد من الأذكار والأدعية الواردة في كتاب حصن المسلم والتي لا غنى عنها في حياتنا اليومية وفي معاملاتنا مع الناس، وذلك بطريقة سهلة وبسيطة.

مميزات التطبيق:
	•	فهرسة الأذكار لسهولة التصفح.
	•	جميع الأذكار مضبوطة بالتشكيل.
	•	يحتوي كل ذكر على سند الحديث الخاص به أو السورة القرآنية وفضل الذكر.
	•	إمكانية إضافة الأذكار المفضلة للوصول إليها بسهولة لاحقًا.
	•	خاصية البحث في الأذكار والفهرس.
	•	خاصية التذكير بأذكار الصباح والمساء وأذكار النوم.
	•	إمكانية تكبير أو تصغير الخط حسب الحاجة.

معلومات إضافية:

تطبيق “حصن المسلم” يحتوي على مجموعة كبيرة من الأذكار والأدعية، مثل:
	•	أذكار الصباح والمساء.
	•	دعاء النوم.
	•	دعاء الاستخارة.
	•	أذكار الصلاة.
	•	أدعية الكرب والهم.
	•	أدعية السفر.
	•	وأذكار أخرى كثيرة تغطي معظم نواحي الحياة اليومية.

روابط هامة:
	•	سياسة الخصوصية: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AGI0OLfQa8hWoHyhh4rMCKIsCsS9p5u0qJg6WWPOvIY/edit?tab=t.0
	•	شروط الاستخدام: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Your multi-sport companion for live scores, fixtures, highlights, standings, and team insights—all in a fast, neon-clean iOS experience. Pick your favorite sports and leagues; our app personalizes the home feed, notifications, and suggestions around what you love.

Why It Stands Out

Multi-Sport, One Flow: Easily switch between football, basketball, American football, baseball, and more—all organized the same, so you never relearn the app.

Match-Day Engine: From fixtures to live stats, line-ups, timelines, and highlights, the app keeps the essential match details together and easy to swipe.

Smart Highlights: Surfaces official match videos and reputable publisher highlights when available; plays inline for a seamless experience.

Built for Personalization: Onboarding captures your favorite leagues and teams; the app tailors scores, alerts, and suggestions to you.

Fast, Neon-Clean UI: SwiftUI interface with a dark-first design, crisp visuals, and smooth interactions.

Core Features

Live & Upcoming: Real-time scores and upcoming fixtures, prioritized for your favorites.

Match Centre: Overview, timeline, stats, line-ups, and media—organized in clear tabs.

Highlights Hub: Match highlights and media with transparent source context.

News You’ll Care About: Curated football news headlines from recognized outlets; team-focused updates when you follow clubs.

Powerful Search: Quickly find teams, players, and events; helpful suggestions for popular clubs and stars.

Favorites & Alerts: Follow leagues and teams; granular notifications for match start, live updates, and final results.

Calendar Sync: Add fixtures to your iOS Calendar with one tap, including reminders.

Standings & Teams: League tables, squads, player profiles, and form at a glance.

Privacy & Principles

No Account Required: Your favorites, alerts, and preferences stay on your device.

Transparent Sources: Uses public sports APIs, official channels, and reputable publishers. The app does not host copyrighted streams or attempt to bypass DRM.

Independent App: Not affiliated with or endorsed by leagues, teams, or rights holders.

Availability Notes

Coverage and highlight availability can vary by sport, league, region, and publisher rights.

Make every match day shine—across your favorite sports.
Turn on your leagues, set your alerts, and let Sport Live bring live scores, highlights, and the details that matter into one fast, focused experience.

developer: Hangzhou Dong Bin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
The DMSS app can enhance your security management efficiency. You can watch real-time surveillance videos and play them back anytime, anywhere, via Wi-Fi or cellular networks. If a device alarm is triggered, DMSS will immediately push an instant notification to you.

DMSS offers：
1. Real-time Live View：
You can view real-time surveillance videos from the added devices anytime, anywhere, to help you better monitor the safety of your home environment.

2. Video Playback：
You can quickly find the events you care about by date and event category, and playback the required historical video footage.

3. Instant Alarm Notifications：
You can subscribe to different alarm events according to your needs.  When an event is triggered, you will immediately receive the message notification.

4. Device Sharing
You can share the device with family members for shared use and assign them different usage permissions.

5. Alarm Hub
You can add a variety of peripheral accessories to the alarm hub to provide warnings for potential theft, intrusion, fire, water damage, and other situations. In case of an unforeseen event, DMSS can immediately activate alarms and send out danger notifications.

6. Visual Intercom
You can add visual intercom devices to engage in video calls between the device and the DMSS, as well as perform functions like locking and unlocking.

7. Access Control
You can add access control devices to check the current status of doors and view unlock records, as well as perform remote unlocking operations on the doors.

Easy Translate - AI Translate uses advanced AI to translate text, speech, images, and dialogues, plus a ChatGPT-style AI assistant and a daily phrase learning feature to help you speak with confidence.

Key Features:
Text Translation - Type or paste text and get fast, accurate translations across many languages.
Voice Translation - Speak naturally and hear or view real-time translations for smooth conversations.
Image Translation - Translate text from photos or camera captures using built-in OCR.
Dialogues Translation - Real-time bilingual conversations that keep your dialogue flowing.
AI ChatGPT-style Conversation - Interact with an intelligent AI assistant for practice, explanations, and language guidance.
Daily Phrases - A new practical phrase every day with examples to help you use it in real life.

Why You'll Love It:
AI-powered translations that are quick and reliableIntuitive, user-friendly interface for travel, study, and work.
Wide language support with context and usage notes.
Translate and review, view history, and build your own phrasebook.
Privacy-focused design with clear data controls.

How It Works:
Choose your language pairs and input method (text, voice, or image).
Switch between translation, conversation, and AI chat modes as needed.
Access daily phrases and practice them in real-life scenarios.

Use Cases:
Traveling, dining out, shopping, studying, business meetings, and everyday chats.
Reading menus, signs, documents, emails, and messages with ease.
Languages and Availability.
Supports dozens of languages with high-quality translations.

Privacy and Security:
We prioritize your privacy. Translation data is used to provide the service and is configurable in settings.
You control your history and how your data is handled.
